column2: Providing the technical support for new International products within the different International Markets and working closely with cross-functional team to discern internal and external customer product wants and needs.         This support would encompass engineering issues and creating new assemblies, parts drawings . This role would require to provide fundamental engineering leadership and expertise. Conduct feasibility studies and develop engineering criteria. Performs expertise analyses to develop design options or recommendations for structures, systems and components. Emphasis will be placed on team participation and ability to achieve results on assigned projects.         Specific responsibilities         Seeks and receives mentoring from senior level and engineering leadership.     Applies basic supply chain cost, value stream capabilities and economic principles.     Seeks approval of budget owner using appropriate request process.     Performs additional responsibilities as requested to achieve business objectives.     Follows engineering and quality processes.         Minimum Requirements (Key Knowledge, Skills Abilities):         4 year degree in Mechanical Engineering or Equivalent     Exposure to project management concepts may be essential for some assignments.     Must be able to assess process concepts and to determine where continuous improvement opportunities exist.     Must be able to communicate effectively with peers and develop a partnering relationship with other team members.     Experience and knowledge in the use of common office automation, communication, software and tools, Herman Miller mainframe applications and engineering related software.     Must have problem solving ability and be able to apply engineering expertise to problem solving.     With minimal supervision must be able to effectively react to changing priorities and work flow and be able to anticipate, recognize, and respond effectively to changes which affect project plans.     Must be able to perform all essential job functions with or without accommodation         Essential Functions:         Research, investigate and understand product criteria, functions, requirements and cost targets (customer criteria, performance requirements, build objectives, manufacturability, assembly, quality, craftsmanship, service, installation).         Independently develops and applies engineering approaches to projects/assignments.     Defines and completes engineering tasks with minimal oversight of leadership.     Investigate new or existing suppliers, materials and manufacturing processes that could provide solutions.     Complete sketches, models, detailed engineering analysis and studies that support the development of new parts and products;     Develop and specify appropriate prototype fabrication processes and materials; coordinate the build of prototype products and the fabrication of prototype parts.     Evaluate and test concept models and prototypes against the project objectives, criteria and requirements.     Identify potential problems on new products and concepts, and develop good corrective actions by following a rigorous problem solving process.     Solicit cost estimates for prototype and production parts.     Communicate clear, concise, accurate and detailed engineering documentation (ECOs, deviations, test requests, work orders, model shop requests, drawings, instructions, emails, etc.).     Work directly with Performance Engineering to develop Performance Requirements and test plans; request physical testing on parts and products then evaluate test results.     Create, maintain and release accurate 3D CAD models, drawings, service parts, instruction sheets, gerber files, schematics, ECOs, BOMs and material specifications for prototype products and production products.     Support the development of planning guides, CSI, tech specs, product labeling and marketing materials.     Support the completion of PPAP and assure parts are properly released for production following HMI procedures.     Work directly with Quality Engineering, Dimensional Engineers and suppliers to refine product designs to achieve quality and craftsmanship objectives.     Manage individual task work to meet project team objectives for budget and timing.     Regularly review part and product designs with development team members, managers, designers and suppliers to solicit their feedback and suggestions for improvements.     Maintain engineering notes, models, records, calculations and analysis that demonstrate the progression of the product designs and review with lead engineers.     Complete patent disclosures and Right to Use (RTU) with HMI legal staff.     Support new patent applications with HMI legal staff when appropriate.     Support other project team members and project activities that require input and task work from the product development engineer: project schedules, project budgets, CMF development, prototype builds, PRs, testing, supplier communications.         Person profile Experience Competencies     8+ years of professional level experience in new product development or continuous improvement of current products.     Demonstrated proficiency in Creo modeling or other equivalent 3D CAD software.     Ability to effectively produce clear accurate and detailed engineering drawings.     Effective communication skills at all levels     Ability to take initiative and assume accountability.     Ability to work with teams and achieving quality results on time.     Lateral thinker and confident problem solver         Characteristics     1. Thinks logically and conceptually     2. Develops innovative ideas and methods     3. Can establish priorities and handle many projects     4. Welcomes responsibility, make decisions and accepts risk.     5. Can work independently and as part of a team. 6. Has flexible approach to change.

column2: Position : New Product Development  Qualification :  DME or BE Mechanical  Exp :  5 to 8 Years in new product development in CNC machining or steel foundry is preferred Salary :  3 LPA to 3.5 LPA Work Location : Coimbatore  Job Profile :    1. Project Management:  Lead and manage new product development projects from initial concept to production implementation, ensuring adherence to project timelines and budgets. Design and Engineering:  Utilize CAD/CAM software to create and optimize designs for CNC machining and steel casting processes. Evaluate design feasibility, manufacturability, and cost-effectiveness. Prototyping:  Oversee the prototyping phase, coordinating with machinists, foundry personnel, and external vendors to produce prototypes for testing and validation. Process Optimization:  Continuously improve manufacturing processes to enhance efficiency, quality, and cost-effectiveness. Identify opportunities for automation and integration of new technologies. Materials Selection:  Work closely with suppliers to identify and qualify materials suitable for CNC machining and steel casting applications. Evaluate material properties and performance characteristics to meet project requirements. Quality Assurance:  Develop and implement quality control measures to ensure the reliability and consistency of manufactured components. Perform inspections and testing throughout the production process. Collaboration:  Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including design engineers, production personnel, sales, and marketing, to align on project objectives and deliverables. Documentation:  Prepare detailed technical documentation, including engineering drawings, specifications, and manufacturing instructions. Maintain accurate records of project progress, issues, and resolutions. Customer Support:  Provide technical support to customers during the product development phase, addressing inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Qualifications / Job knowledge / skill & Competence required: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Manufacturing Engineering, or related field. Advanced degree preferred. 3+ years of experience in new product development, preferably in a CNC machining or steel foundry environment. Proficiency in CAD/CAM software (e.g., SolidWorks, AutoCAD, Mastercam) and FEA analysis tools. Strong understanding of CNC machining, metal casting, and fabrication processes. Knowledge of materials science, metallurgy, and heat treatment techniques. Excellent project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines. column2: Job Purpose   Summarize why this job exists and how it contributes to the overall   business of the organization. To what extent and how does this role impact the immediate   environment and the wider organization?  Does the role have a major financial impact?   If yes, is direct or indirect?   Donaldson's   MS Current Product Engineering, Global Tech Group is looking for an Engineer   I. In this role, you would lead global Engineering Change Projects on both   Product and Process fronts. Your mechanical aptitude and problem-solving   skills are essential for driving engineering projects forward.   Responsibilities include interpreting drawings and standards to ensure project   completion aligns with manufacturing ease of processing while monitoring costs.   This opportunity offers valuable insights into technology and a deep   understanding of the engineering process.   Key Accountabilities   Identify the essential accountabilities of the role (5-6) and their   purpose. It should NOT be a list of tasks that the jobholder must perform.   Instead it should be a description of the duty areas and each duty typically   refers to a number of tasks.  Identify the key performance measurement criteria which should   be quantitative and qualitative    Leading        projects for engineering changes in existing Air/Liquid/Hydraulic        filtration products through CQP or Engineering Change Orders (ECOs). Carrying out        all project management activities from change initiation to implementation        for various types of engineering changes such as qualifying a new        supplier, new material, new tool for plastic parts, cost reduction and        design changes. Communicating        and collaborating with Project Leaders, Application Engineers, Sales        Representatives, Suppliers, Procurement Teams, Quality and Production        Engineers to implement engineering changes or find optimal solutions to        problems. Utilizing        Oracle Business Intelligence to obtain desired information about        products and product supply. Reviewing        engineering drawings and providing design guidance and input on plastic,        rubber and sheet metal products. Recommending alternative solutions as        required. Collaborating        with Cross-Functional Teams (CFT) to resolve engineering issues according        to drawing standards and manufacturing feasibility. Demonstrating        knowledge of Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) workflow cycles. Proficient in        software tools such as NX, Creo, Teamcenter and Oracle BI. Demonstrating        design knowledge of engine filtration systems and supporting the        development of design drawings to achieve technical objectives        consistent with established guidelines, customer requirements and design        specifications. Demonstrating Knowledge        of ECO or ECN, Drafting, PPAP, DVP&R, Dimensional Reports, SPC, Testing        & Validation protocols.   Key Qualifications & Requirements      Specific academic or professional qualifications/experience/competence   necessary for this position    Education Qualification:  Bachelors degree in mechanical        engineering or related field, Advanced degree preferred. knowledge of NX (NX11 is        preferred), Creo, Teamcenter PLM and SharePoint a plus. Proficient in MS Office:        Outlook, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint   Technical Competence & Skills: Understanding of   industry design standards for gemetric dimensioning and tolerancing (GD&T)   principles.  Experience with   plastic part design Knowledge of   injection, blow, rotational & rubber molding process Knowledge of sheet   metal pressing & fabrication process Familiarity        with ECN, Drafting, PPAP, DVP&R, Dimensional Reports, SPC, XFMEA, Testing        & Validation protocols. Able to   communicate effectively at a global level. Proficiency in organizing,   planning, and coordinating with the Global Team to meet customer expectations.   Leadership Competence: Inherit Donaldson core values of Integrity,        respect & commitment. Proactive towards identifying the issues and solving        the problems. Individual leadership. Project Management skills   Effective team player & communicator       Relevant Experience: 3+ years of professional Engineering, Engineering        Tech or Engineering Design work experience. Experience in Engine Filtration products and        IMDS/CDX activities (Optional).   Others (% of travel, language, etc.):  Ability to travel approximately 10% per year. Ability to read, analyze and interpret the        engineering documents (drawings, engineering specifications). Ability to respond timely & effectively to        the critical inquiries / technical issues or complaints. Ability to make effective presentations on        regular updates & critical issues to global team. Ability to communicate effectively both        verbally and in writing with a wide variety of global personnel. Ability to work flexible hours.

column2: In this leadership role, you serve as a senior technical resource for the organization, regularly interacting with other senior managers. You are an internally recognized expert in packaging development and packaging engineering. In this role, you identify, define and solve complex business problems by applying broad technical and consumer knowledge as well as an in-depth understanding of packaging technologies related to Mondel z products.           How you will contribute:               In this role, you define and lead material development programs for global cross category team, addressing technical challenges and emerging technology needs across the portfolio     You will offer consumer insights to provide input to programs, define technical strategies and act as gatekeeper for technical rigor on material specifications     As senior member of the global packaging team, you will need to build strong cross functional partnerships with R&D, Quality, Manufacturing and Procurement     Additionally, you will drive to ensure a robust intellectual property strategy is in place and collaborate regarding all relevant compliance policies and government regulations     Additionally, you will act as the technical advisor for flexible packaging materials for the Global Packaging Team - leveraging your experience and knowledge of polymer technology, performance, and product/package interaction with the team                 What you will bring:       A desire to drive your future and accelerate your career by applying your experience and knowledge:       Extensive experience in packaging flexible and rigid materials, focus on designing experiments/work tracks to land solutions, grounded in sound data, that meet technical and equipment program requirements     Successful track record in project management and implementation of new ideas     Demonstrated thought leadership and drive for results, with ability to formulate strategy while planning and problem solving in a dynamic and outcome-oriented environment     Ability to lead multi-functional and multi-cultural project teams     Ability to leverage internal and external resources and working in a highly matrixed environment     An affinity for innovation and resiliency in the face of challenges     Strong technical network, inclusive of suppliers, technology partners, universities, and research institutes     Experience in barrier coating systems and polymers is desired     Ability to coach and inspire junior developers in packaging community     Strong influencing capabilities with the ability to effect change internally throughout the MDLZ organization (supply chain, procurement, marketing, R&D) and externally with end-to-end value chain partners from raw material suppliers to recyclers.                         Education / Certifications:       MS/PhD in Polymer Science, Physical Chemistry, Chemical Engineering or similar discipline

column2: ?     Be a part of the Medtronic Engineering and Innovation center (MEIC) by applying your skills to the growth and development sustaining efforts of Medical Devices products at MEIC.      As a member of the MEIC team, you will collaborate with the broader Medical Devices engineering team, clinical and commercial teams globally. You will enable design development of medical devices/products and the associated infrastructure capability building elements in close conjunction with the Global teams.        ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES       Be part of an extended RD team and provide engineering support for design, development or optimization of products, processes, tooling and/or equipment by collaborating with the necessary stakeholders.   Lead design reviews with cross functional team to ensure the design meets the product requirements for safety, reliability and manufacturability.    Prepare necessary component /assembly drawings by following ASME guidelines and assist in release of the same in the PLM systems.    Support sustaining/release product engineering tasks and activities by ensuring compliance with applicable procedures.       Assist in the preparation of Product Risk Management documents (DFMEA, Memo/ report) along with Quality Engineering team.    Assist in creation of necessary DHF documentation along with relevant project stakeholders to ensure timely completion and release per project schedules.        Prepare reports, presentations and spreadsheets of an analytical and interpretative nature to be presented to peers, executives, customers.   Must learn and ensure compliance with all GBU design control processes and procedures.   Should maintain accountability and successfully deliver projects/tasks assigned.   Incorporate required regulatory standards (FDA, ISO) in developmental and/or sustaining engineering projects including written protocols, test methods, assembly processes and the design history file.        PRINCIPAL WORKING RELATIONSHIPS       The incumbent would work with the project management office at MEIC to ensure that resource forecasts, project metrics are correctly captured and presented to the leadership   Frequent interaction with team members from other disciplines, cross functional teams, to understand project requirements and to adhere to project schedules.    Possible interaction with clinicians, third-party vendors, manufacturers, and subcontractors.          EXPERIENCE        Bachelor s Degree in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent with 8 to 13 years of Product Development and Sustaining experience.        KNOWLEDGE, SKILL, AND ABILITY       In-depth experience in CAD tools such as Pro-E Creo/Solid works is expected.   Expertise in Robust Modeling and Detailing practices following the ASME guidelines.   Strong Knowledge and application of GDT including Tolerance stack-up analysis.   Strong knowledge of metal manufacturing processes. Knowledge on 3D printing and additive manufacturing technologies is an add-on.    Knowledge on Engineering Change management processes and PLM tools such as Agile, PTC Windchill is preferred.   Strong understanding of medical device standards , guidelines and regulations per ISO 13485, ISO 14971 and Design controls ( 21 CFR Part 820).       Ability to create, assess or review applicable product DHF deliverables such as Risk files, Sterilization reports, Bio-compatibility reports etc. along with support from relevant project stakeholders.    Strong knowledge of Engineering fundamentals and application of same during concept generation or re-design of products.   Able to effectively work with cross functional teams in a multinational matrix organization   Superior written and verbal communication skills required.   Good attitude and team player.       About Medtronic           We want to accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations - but we will only succeed with the right people on our team. Let s work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients lives. Help us shape the future.      Physical Job Requirements      The physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.     ?     ?For Office Roles: While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to be independently mobile. The employee is also required to interact with a computer, and communicate with peers and co-workers. Contact your manager or local HR to understand the Work Conditions and Physical requirements that may be specific to each role. (ADA-United States of America)

column2: Simulation Engineer:Model Development: Simulation Engineers create mathematical or computational models that represent real-world systems, processes, or phenomena     These models are typically developed using software tools and programming languages     Data Collection: They gather and analyze relevant data and information to inform the development of accurate and realistic simulation models     Software and Tools: Proficiency in simulation software and tools is essential     Common tools include MATLAB, Simulink, Arena, AnyLogic, and more, depending on the specific application     Coding and Scripting: Simulation Engineers often write code or scripts to implement custom simulations or to extend the functionality of existing software     Validation and Verification: They validate and verify simulation models to ensure that they accurately represent the real system or process     This may involve comparing simulation results with real-world data     Collaboration: Effective communication and collaboration with subject matter experts, stakeholders, and other team members are important to ensure that the simulation meets its objectives     Documentation: Simulation Engineers document their work, including model design, assumptions, data sources, and results, to facilitate understanding and future maintenance     Performance Optimization: They may work on optimizing simulation performance to ensure that models run efficiently, especially for complex or real-time simulations     Senior Simulation Engineer:Senior Simulation Engineers typically have more experience and may take on additional responsibilities:Project Leadership: Senior Simulation Engineers may lead simulation projects, taking charge of project planning, team coordination, and resource management     Complex Modeling: They are often involved in more complex or intricate modeling tasks that require a deep understanding of the system being simulated     Mentoring and Training: Senior Simulation Engineers may mentor and train junior engineers, helping them develop their skills and knowledge in simulation     Innovation: They may drive innovation in simulation techniques, exploring new technologies, methods, and best practices to improve modeling and analysis capabilities     Strategic Decision-Making: Senior Simulation Engineers often contribute to strategic decision-making by providing valuable insights gained from simulations     Quality Assurance: They ensure the quality and accuracy of simulation models and results, especially in critical applications like healthcare, aerospace, or finance     Regulatory Compliance: In certain industries, such as healthcare or aviation, they may ensure that simulations comply with regulatory standards and guidelines     Project Management: They may take on a more significant role in managing the overall simulation project, including budgeting, scheduling, and client or stakeholder communication
column11: Biw, Delmia, Simulation, Mechanical, Automotive, Robotics, Process simulation

column2: We are currently looking for an ambitious systems engineering professional to join our factory RD team in Bangalore within the Advanced Therapies (AT) business line. We are a global technology leader in robotic-assisted vascular interventions, surgical C-arms, and Cath labs. Our solutions have a wide impact across clinical domains (orthopedics, urology, neurosurgery, cardiac interventions and so on) across market segments.             Description/Definition             The System Engineer is responsible for specification and functional requirements and the verification of development results related to these requirements. He/she ensures continuous system-oriented development, ensures reliable clarification on system-relevant aspects and supports release activities as a system expert.              Key Areas of responsibility include but are not limited to:                       Requirements analysis and development of the system functional specification (PH).          Establish traceability between system functional specifications and its source requirements.          Develop system architecture in collaboration with the SW architecture team.          Plan and conduct system architecture reviews at defined project milestones to ensure coherence.          Support the realization process to ensure proper requirements implementation. This includes but is not limited to requirements clarification, design reviews, etc          Support the requirements development at Clinical Workflow for technical feasibility and review the requirement specification.          Plan and coordinate system integration with Project Management and Technology. Evaluate test results and provide recommendations for project decisions.          Lead the Change Control Board (CCB) and coordinate change requests and defect reports.          Define and establish quality gates in collaboration with Clinical Workflow and Technology.          Plan intermediate releases and product functionality for trade shows and clinical use tests in collaboration with Clinical Workflow and Technology.          Prepare supply chain creating design transfer documentation and database entries (eg SAP) as needed.          Analyze project ideas and proposals for feasibility and impact on existing commitments.          Support patent applications by evaluating content for feasibility and business impact.      The System Engineer of AT is actively and collaboratively involved in the continuous improvement of processes in his/her area of responsibility.         Job knowledge, skills, and experience             Bachelor/ Master in Electronics/ Electrical engineering with at least 4-5 years of work experience, preferably with X-ray diagnostic medical products         Hands-on experience in electronics design (architecture and/ or PCB design) and IEC compliance testing.          A go-getter driving interactions between other team members, stakeholders from other Siemens Healthineers global locations and internal factory teams ensuring things get done.         A good background of MDR, Medical device Regulatory affairs, IEC Standards and Medical device Risk Management is a plus.         Candidates with exposure to end-end medical device product development highly preferred

column1: System Studies Engineer - HVDC Control & Protection
column2: Performing advanced network studies for HVDC projects during offers and execution (such studies include Dynamic Performance, Network Restoration, and Interaction).         Developing and validating detailed simulation models for several EMT software, such as PSCAD/EMTDC, Matlab/Simulink and EMTP-RV.         Optimizing the overall behavior of HVDC control systems (for instance with regards to dynamic and black-start performances) according to the customer s technical specifications and national grid code requirements.         Developing and parametrizing advanced HVDC control systems such active filtering, grid forming and multi-terminal controls.         Analyzing potential interactions, such as control and sub-synchronous torsional interactions, between the HVDC converter and other controlled devices in the power system via simulation models and the analysis of the converter harmonic impedance.         Presenting study results to customers written and orally, as well as training the customers on the developed simulation models and explaining their documentation.         Support to the project management with expertise in technical discussions, participation in customer meetings and coordination of external partners.               Your Skills And Qualifications               University degree (Master/Bachelor) in electrical power engineering.        5   + years of professional experience in the area of Power Systems studies and modelling of electrical network/HVDC/FACTS.         Good knowledge in high voltage applications, power transmission systems, power electronics and HVDC technology. Knowledge of relevant global standards, regulations, and guidelines.         Expertise in control engineering and modelling of HVDC systems in the time domain and frequency domain.         Professional user of typical power system simulation programs (eg, PSCAD/EMTDC, Matlab/Simulink, EMTP-RV, PSSE, Python Tools)         Fluent English mandatory (spoken and written).         Outstanding team skills, initiative, and customer orientation.         High ability to work in a multi-national and multi-cultural team.     This role is based in Gurgaon/Chennai, where you ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries - and the shape of things to come. column2: Role & responsibilities  - 1. Conduct research and technical analysis of different electronics components and their compatibility for product development.  2. Design, develop, test, and maintain embedded firmware for TI and various other SoCs.  3. Write efficient, modular, and reusable code for embedded systems using languages such as C, C++, or Assembly language.  4. Develop and optimize firmware for real-time applications, ensuring precise timing and responsiveness to system events.  5. Work on the integration of firmware with hardware components, including microcontrollers, sensors, and communication interfaces. 6. Write low-level code for tasks such as interrupt handling, memory management, and power management to optimize system performance and resource utilization.  7. Debug firmware issues using tools like oscilloscopes, logic analyzers, and debuggers, and implement fixes to ensure the reliable operation of embedded systems.  8. Develop and execute test plans to verify the functionality, performance, and reliability of embedded firmware, including unit testing, integration testing, and system testing.  9. Create and maintain technical documentation including design documents, specifications, and user manuals to support firmware development and integration processes.  10. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including hardware engineers, software developers, and QA engineers to deliver high-quality embedded solutions on schedule. 11. Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations relevant to embedded systems development. 12. Keep abreast of the latest trends and advancements in embedded systems, firmware development tools, and technologies, and incorporate best practices into firmware development processes.  Preferred candidate profile- 1. Available for the Offline mode of the Job.  2. Can start the work/job between 1st May 2024 to 15th May 2024.  3. Have relevant skills and interests. Perks and benefits   1. For Joining full-time, the ESOP option will be offered after 1.5 years of joining. 2. Certificate & Letter of recommendation.  3. If joining offline food and accommodation will be taken care of by Ksham Innovation.

column2: Key Responsibilities: Project Management:  From initial ideas to launch, you'll manage and review the entire NPD and project pipeline, keeping everything on track and on time. Research & Development:  You'll conduct market research, analyze competitor trends, and identify opportunities for new custom projects. Design & Innovation:  Working with specifications, you'll design new products that meet customer or market needs. NPD Process:  You'll manage the entire New Product Development (NPD) process. Technical Documentation:  Creating clear and detailed technical documentation for all new products is essential, and you'll be the expert in making it happen. Collaboration:  Liaising with our manufacturing team is key to ensuring new products are produced according to specification and meet manufacturing standards Compliance management:  Identify which products require compliance? and then manage compliance certificates of any building codes (AS, NZS) through meticulous specification creation. You would work with Product manager and team to deliver this. Essential Skills: Research Skills:  A keen understanding of market trends and competitor analysis to identify opportunities for innovative custom projects. Design Savvy:  The ability to translate customer needs and specifications into creative and functional product designs. NPD Process Champion:  Experience managing the entire NPD process, from ideation to launch, ensuring smooth collaboration with internal and external partners. Technical Communication Pro:  Strong written and verbal skills to create clear and concise technical documentation for new products. Manufacturing Liaison:  Excellent communication and collaboration skills to effectively bridge the gap between NPD and manufacturing teams. Project Management Master:  Proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, keeping them on track, within budget, and meeting deadlines. Preferred candidate profile Diploma Engineering graduate minimum in Mechanical engineering Proven experience 4+ years in New product development or project management Bonus Skills: Experience with Design Software:  Familiarity with design software programs relevant to technical documentation is a plus. Product Prototyping Expertise:  Prior experience in prototyping new products is a valuable asset. Global Mindset:  Understanding of international markets and regulations can be a significant advantage.` AI Softwares  : Advanced user of chatGPT, Asana, Midjourney Key Performance Results: Successfully introduce at least 5 new products within the first year, meeting all quality and market readiness standards. Streamline the NPD process to reduce development time and increase efficiency. Why Choose Williams Architectural? Innovative Excellence:  Be part of a team that pioneers innovative hardware solutions, setting industry standards worldwide. Global Role:  Gain exposure to the international market, contributing to our success and growth on a global scale. Career Advancement:  Take your career to new heights with clear paths for growth and opportunities for leadership development. Learning and Development Culture:  Experience a supportive work environment that values teamwork, respect, and a huge focus on growth Competitive Benefits:  Receive competitive salaries and comprehensive benefits, ensuring your financial security and peace of mind. International Travel:  Exceptional performance in this role may lead to the chance to travel to our headquarters in Australia and other countries as you help it expand Overall, at Williams Architectural, you'll find a fulfilling and rewarding career where you can make a meaningful contribution while growing both personally and professionally. Salary:  5 - 7 lakhs per year (all-inclusive) Bonus:  Up to 20% extra based on your performance. Perks: Paid time off for holidays, vacations & sick leave (4 weeks) Travel compensation for work-related trips Work Schedule:  We operate on a rotating schedule: One week: Monday - Friday Next week: Monday - Saturday Imagine crafting hardware that elevates spaces. Join a legacy, build a future. Ready to turn the ordinary into extraordinary? Join us!

column2: Careers that Change Lives The Software Test Engineer will focus on supporting medical device software testing for the Embedded System. The position is a hands-on test development & individual contributor role with a dynamic set of responsibilities in a complex software system including test design & development, design of test automation framework, test scripts development and test execution.  Responsibility Develop and execute comprehensive test plans for embedded software applications used in medical devices, adhering to relevant healthcare software testing standards. Design and implement various test cases, including unit testing, integration testing, and system testing. Provide support for NPTV (Non-product tool validation). Utilize automated testing tools and techniques to improve test efficiency and coverage. Analyze test results, identify software defects, and report them to development teams according to established procedures. Participate in code reviews and provide feedback to ensure code quality and testability from a testing perspective. Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in embedded systems testing and healthcare software development regulations. Collaborate with engineers across various disciplines (development, quality assurance, regulatory) to ensure successful project completion. Develop test strategies and validate test scripts, verification of software for Embedded Medical System. Navigate the complexities of industry and government regulations to include IEC62304 and FDA QSR (Quality System Regulation) requirements. Analyze unexpected, undesirable, or non-understood behavior in software and in interactions of software with hardware. Document results of defect analysis. Participates in other quality assurance functions, including, but not limited to, static code analysis, risk/hazard analysis, and test automation development. QUALIFICATIONS Bachelors degree in computer science & Electronics & Communication or related engineering discipline.  4-8 years of experience in embedded systems testing, with a preference for experience in the healthcare domain. column1: Senior Staff Engineer/Staff Engineer, Design Application Engineering
column2: The ideal candidate should hold a Bachelors or Masters degree in Electrical & Electronic Engineering. Additional VLSI design courses area plus.      The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of relevant working experience in semicustom design flow and project.      The ideal candidate should possess strong experience in implementation areas, including Synthesis, DFT, and PnR, as well as good exposure to signoff areas, particularly power, timing, and IR signoff.      Knowledge of physical verification (DRC & LVS) is considered an advantage      It is required that the candidate has exposure to basic version management using any of Clearcase\ / Perforce\ / Cliosoft\ / Git.      The candidate must possess excellent communication skills to interact effectively with peers and customers in a clear and honest manner      The candidate should be open to learning new technical areas if the need arises.      The ideal candidate should possess an internal drive to work with design and EDA vendors to solve issues and adopt new flows.      The candidate should have reasonable ability to automate design work by means of script programming, e.g. Tcl\/tk, Perl or Python         Responsibilities :       As a member of the Design Application Engineering (DAE) team at Infineon Bangalore, you will be responsible for supporting project teams using Infineon Design System (Flows, Design Packages, and Methodologies).      You will be the first point of contact for project teams in case of issues and will work to achieve the highest customer satisfaction.      You should have a deep understanding of and be able to support design methodologies across semi-custom design flows, including RTL analysis, design verification, DFT, synthesis, place and route, STA, EM\/IR, and physical verification.      You should be able to identify methodology gaps and improvements and provide automation to perform all design activities in the most efficient and correct-by-construction way.      You should be able to evaluate solutions from multiple available options and be able to perform trade-offs between technical features and cost.      You will work with R&D in Infineon globally and EDA tool vendors to resolve issues across semi-custom design flows.      You will coordinate with IT and EDA tool license teams to provide an infrastructure aligned with project needs.      Your primary goal is to significantly improve the quality, efficiency, and time to market of Infineon development projects
column11: Design verification, Project development, Automation, DFT, GIT, Application engineering, TCL/TK, Physical verification, Perl, Python

column2: As Mechanical R&D Engineer, you will work on the standardization of our products and systems. Together with the members of your team, you will develop efficient and effective solutions that contribute to multidisciplinary projects. The products you develop will be released to our Engineering department as building blocks that can subsequently be configured and reintegrated into our customer systems, all over the world.     You will support your colleagues in the application and integration process, as you are the mechanical owner of functional system parts.     The result of your effort and deliveries will be our company standard, which will be incorporated into our so called Platform .             Your Department:         In Research and Development (R&D), no two days are the same. Our activities are based all over the world and each project is different. Whatever the challenge, it all requires research and development (R&D). Our colleagues are creative and proactive in thinking both inside and outside the box. This helps us to create state-of-the-art solutions that enhance the operational performance of Vanderlande s customers worldwide.         ?             Tasks and responsibilities:         Improving, Optimizing and Maintaining our standard product portfolio with the aid of    SOLIDWORKS 3D CAD.       Creating a standard mechanical design, models based on information available in standard documentation, upfront discussion with experts for opinion, which results in an optimal solution.     Release designs, documentation and bill of material for production with a quality mindset.     Supporting internal customers by answering their technical questions like supply chain, Sales, Service, and project engineering.     You are responsible for the mitigation of design risks.     Contribute to the development of the mechanical technical competence.             Your profile   :       You must have a bachelor s or master s degree in mechanical engineering.     You must have relevant working experience of 7-10 years in the industry and a strong interest in mechanics, problem-solving, production techniques and machinery.     You must have experience with SOLIDWORKS Modeling, detail Drawings, drawing standards & should be able to understand & create a Bill of material (BOM).     You must have good knowledge of machine design & machine components.     You must understand manufacturing processes (sheet metal- focus) & their limitations.      You must understand Safety regulations & standards (European / ISO).     You have good communication skills and are a good team player across multidisciplinary, multicultural and international teams. Main communication language is English.     Able to collect information from layouts, reference documents and product experts to create a relevant standard product solution.     Understanding of logistical transportation systems: flexible thinking. Can understand the parcel from unloading, transportation, sortation and finally loading into a truck.

column2: Job description: About Carrier: LRR Technologies is currently hiring talented people to work with Carrier Corporation. Carrier Corporation (NYSE: CARR) is a global provider of innovative heating, ventilating, and air conditioning (HVAC), refrigeration, fire, security, and building automation technologies boasting annual sales of over $20 billion, with 58,000 employees spread across 160+ countries. For its R&D center in Hyderabad, Carrier is looking for a talented Thermal Engineer (Modelling).   Roles and Responsibilities: Proficiency in formulating physics-based equations for Single/Two-phase Flow & Thermal interacting components. Experience in solving equation-based model in one or more integrated solver toolchains, such as DYMOLA, MATLAB, and Open Modelica. Knowledge in scripting using Python. Strong technical writing abilities to provide high-quality documentation and standard work. Educational Qualifications: Masters in Mechanical Engineering with Specialization in Thermal Engineering.   Perks and Benefits: The position will pay quite well - Rs.16-25 lakh per annum is the band, and the final amount may be even higher depending on your experience and expertise. If made an offer, you will need to join in 4 weeks. This is the opportunity of a lifetime for people looking to specialize in highly coveted niche futuristic skills, and to work in a top multinational company with excellent employee-first initiatives. We look forward to your application.

column2: The RTL (Register Transfer Level) Design Engineer is responsible for designing and implementing digital circuits and systems using hardware description languages (HDL) and design tools plays a crucial role in the development of complex integrated circuits (ICs) and contributes to the overall success of the design projects       Key Responsibilities:       Design and implement digital circuits and systems at the RTL level using hardware description languages (HDL) such as VHDL or Verilog     Collaborate with system architects to understand design requirements and specifications     Develop microarchitecture and RTL coding for various functional blocks and modules     Utilize industry-standard design tools and methodologies for RTL design, synthesis, and optimization     Perform logic design, register transfer level coding, and functional verification of digital designs     Conduct timing analysis and optimization to ensure design performance meets specifications     Collaborate with physical design engineers to address design constraints and ensure successful physical implementation     Participate in design reviews and contribute to the identification and resolution of design issues     Write and maintain design documentation, including specifications, design constraints, and test plans     Keep up to date with the latest developments in RTL design methodologies, tools, and technologies       Qualifications and Skills:       Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field     X years of experience in digital IC design or RTL design, preferably in the semiconductor industry     Proficiency in hardware description languages (HDL) such as VHDL or Verilog     Strong understanding of digital design principles, RTL coding techniques, and synchronous design methodologies     Experience with industry-standard EDA (Electronic Design Automation) tools, such as synthesis, simulation, and verification tools     Familiarity with scripting languages (eg, Tcl, Perl, Python) for design automation and scripting tasks     Knowledge of digital design verification methodologies, including simulation, linting, and formal verification     Familiarity with FPGA prototyping and emulation platforms is a plus     Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with attention to detail     Strong communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams

column2: Vipul Organics Ltd is a speciality chemicals company manufacturing dyes and pigments for over 50 years. We are now also venturing out into production of polymeric membranes for filtration applications. With the ever increasing demand for efficient water treatment technologies, membrane filtration will play a crucial role, and Vipul Organics aspires to become Indias leading membrane manufacturer. We are looking for motivated individuals who can take up responsibility and going ahead will be in key managerial positions in the membranes division in the company.  Role & responsibilities     This engineer will be responsible for developing new membranes as well as scaling up membrane production.  This position is also responsible for the maintenance and operation of the equipment required to accomplish this.   The Membrane Product Engineer must use laboratory equipment, such as membrane casting machines, permeation cells, weighing scales, stir plates, and fume hoods to prepare and dispense solutions for coating membrane and also to test them for performance.  The Membrane Product Engineer must also be able to operate the large roll-to-roll equipment used for making the membrane. The engineer will also be responsible for making spiral wound membrane modules.  The Engineer is responsible for collecting and recording relevant data from the operation of that equipment.  The engineer must also take responsibility for giving technical input in the design and purchase of specialised equipment required for membrane production and testing. This position will conduct testing of membranes and modules to quantify and optimize performance of existing and new membrane products.  The ability to analyse experimental data, present findings at group meetings, and contribute to project reports is essential. This position includes training in the operation and maintenance of laboratory and liquid separation membrane test systems. Preferred candidate profile     A BS, MS or PhD degree in Chemical Engineering, Chemistry or a related field is required. Experience in the field of membrane production is necessary.  Should have hands on knowledge of membrane production and testing as well membrane module making.  Excellent problem solving and interpersonal skills are essential.  Ability to work both independently and closely with other team members to achieve group goals is a must. Perks and benefits   Type - Full Time Location - Andheri West Mumbai Contact - hr@vipulorganics.com Opening - 2.
column11: Polymer Chemistry, Membrane Seperation Technology, Material Science, Research And Development, Polymeric Membrane, Product Development, Membrane Technology, Innovation, Filtration, Technology Development, Seperation Technology

column2: Job Title: CNC Programmer Company Description: We are a Heavy Industry manufacturing company specializing in precision machined metallurgical products. We are currently seeking a highly skilled CNC Programmer to operate, maintain, and manage our CNC Lathes, CNC Vertical Turret Lathes, and Cylindrical Grinding Machines. Job Description: The CNC Programmer will be responsible for reading and interpreting technical blueprints, inputting the design specifications into computer modeling software, adjusting machine cutting paths, and performing quality checks on the final product. The ideal candidate will have significant experience in CNC programming, particularly with Siemens Control Programming, and a strong mechanical aptitude, including good math skills. This role requires a detail-oriented, meticulous individual with strong problem-solving skills, an ability to work on a shift basis, and the capacity to co-work with other fellow employees as required. Responsibilities: - Develop, test, and optimize CNC programs for CNC Lathes, CNC Vertical Turret Lathes, and Cylindrical Grinding Machines using CAD/CAM software. - Read and interpret engineering drawings and input the product design into computer modeling software. - Select and load the correct cutting tools for the job and adjust machine settings to the desired product specifications. - Work closely with machinists, production managers, and design engineers for optimal machining processes. - Troubleshoot and resolve issues during the manufacturing process. - Maintain, clean, and perform basic maintenance on the CNC machines. - Maintain clear and accurate documentation of all CNC programs. - Ensure all machining operations meet safety standards and quality requirements. - Comply with safety guidelines and foster a safe work environment. - Train and guide new staff members on machine operation procedures. Requirements: - Diploma in Mechanical Engineering, B.E / B. Tech in Mechanical Engineering, or equivalent work experience. - 3 to 8 years of experience in Siemens Control Programming. - Proficient with CAD/CAM software, preferably AutoCAD. - Strong understanding of geometric dimensioning and tolerancing (GD&T). - Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. - Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment. - Good interpersonal and communication skills. - Ability to read mechanical drawings and documents. Working Conditions: This position is full-time and requires flexibility with hours as it is based on a shift system. Physical demands include standing for extended periods, lifting heavy objects, and wearing protective gear. We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

column2: What you??l do:       If you desire to be part of something special, to be part of a winning team, to be part of a fun team ??winning is fun.? We are looking forward to  Associate Engineer -EV Connector ?based   in Pune, India. In Eaton, making our work exciting, engaging, meaningful; ensuring safety,?health, wellness; and being a model of inclusion & diversity are already embedded in who we are - it?? in our values, part of our vision, and our clearly defined aspirational goals. ? This exciting role offers opportunity to:    You will be a part of a winning team where you will get exposure to engineer Connectors & Terminal ?solutions for Electric Vehicle applications. You'll need to understand and support the engineering efforts for connector product group in a matrix organization as an Associate Engineer in Connector division of Vehicle group?? ?   "Job Responsibilities 1. This role will contribute to design electrical connectors and terminals for electric vehicle applications. 2. Ideal candidate shall have basic understanding of electronics and electrical fundamentation with strong acumen in mechanical product design with CAD skills. 3. Derive requirements for the overall size, fastening, current rating, protection and mounting for electrical connectors and terminals 4. Develop concepts meeting the requirements as clean sheet design and enhance from current design variants with in the product portfolio 5. Work with Project Lead to support and aexecute the project activities to meet the project deliverables on time 6. Compare competitor products through soft / hard benchmarking and improvise unique design concepts that is compact, lower in weight, faster heat dissipation and other differentiated technical attributes 7. Perform basic calcuations of weight, load distribution, fastener loads, etc to support the design refinement of connectors and terminals 8. Create drawings for concept evaluation and apply GD&T controls for part quality and acceptance of critical features. Link special characters to process capability 9. Apply DFSS principles & tools (ex: B&P diagrams, Scorecard, DFMEA) to deliver a robust engineering design 10. Release drawings to suppliers for prototypes and production through CO / CR in ENOVIA PLM system following the standard process routes 11. Prepare design review documents and assist engineering leads & program managers for NPI execution."            Qualifications:       1) Bachelor's / Master's degree in Mechanical / Electrical / Mechatronics Engineering with 0-2 Yrs of experience in Electrical/ Automotive Industry in electromechanical system? 2)?Mechanical Product design, CAD skills Basic understanding of electrical            Skills:         Need to have 'Go Beyond mindset'?   Good presentation, communication & leadership skills needed to drive the technical decision /conclusions ?   Ability to operate with minimal supervision"

column2: To ensure success in this position, Associate Manager typically responsible for managing a team of engineers and technicians who design and develop wiring harnesses for various          applications. Some of the specific responsibilities may include overseeing the design process, ensuring compliance with industry and customer standards, managing project timelines          and budgets, coordinating with suppliers and manufacturing teams, and providing technical guidance to team members                  Mandatory Requirement:          Extremely good at the Design and development of Wiring harnesses (New Product Development).      Good Experience in the selection of components.      Assure product capability and quality by designing electrical testing methods, testing finished products, and system capabilities.      Team handling experience with guiding team technically. Good communication Managing skills.          Technical Skills:          Delegates and oversees work related to wire harness design, development, and manufacturing feasibility. Develops products by studying applicable standards. Assists in defining customer requirements.      Electrical knowledge to calculate voltage drops, choose wire gauges and make similar design decisions is required. Strong knowledge on wiring harness components sourcing costing.      Roles and responsibilities      Produce design and production documentation including schematics, boarding drawings, splice, and termination sheets.      Prepares reports on wire harness and electrical systems, products, components, and applications by designing and conducting research programs, and applying knowledge of electricity and materials.      Maintains project reports and customer interaction when required.      Ability to train and guide technicians and engineers. Enhances staff accomplishments and competence by planning the delivery of solutions, answering technical and procedural questions for less experienced team members, and teaching improved processes.      Mentors team members in other areas of expertise. Contributes to process improvement initiatives.      Ensure legal compliance with state, federal, and OSHA requirements.      Ensure ISO procedures are followed.      Maintain compliance with all company policies and procedures.      Associate Manager may be responsible for developing and implementing process improvements, staying up-to-date on industry trends and technologies, and communicating project progress and status updates to stakeholders.      additional skills/competencies required      Non-automotive/Automotive and/or high-voltage battery experience/EV harness is required.      Experience in 2D CAD drawing package is required. Autodesk AutoCAD and 3D CAD experience are preferred.          Soft Skills:          Expertise in MS-Office      Communication      Team Cohesiveness      Adaptability      Creativity      Interpersonal Skills

column2: We are looking for a Research & Development Engineer to join the PASS team. The candidate will assume a design engineer role in the design & development of various modules/sub-systems of high voltage PASS product (viz. circuit breaker, disconnector, earthing switch, LCC cabinet, structure, etc.). The candidate shall be able to demonstrate a strong electro-mechanical design & development background combined with excellent analytical, and project management skills and hands-on experience with state-of-the-art design techniques.     Global product technical support for worldwide technology centers and factories. You will collaborate with cross-functions including GPM, quality, operation, SCM.     You will perform or check dielectric and mechanical calculations. You will work on the pressurized vessel simulation and design, work on gas tightness and sealing Design. You will create 3D models and 2D drawings proficiently for HV PASS components Development. You will prepare the Design & detailing of various modules/sub-systems of high voltage PASS (Circuit breaker, disconnector, bus bar/bus duct, earthing switch, structure).     You will perform tolerance chain calculation and kinematic chain analysis. Participates constructively in working teams. Shares own technical/scientific knowledge in own projects and supports colleagues in applying processes and tools to ensure timely and high-quality results.     Shows solid documentation skills and writes technical reports independently. You will perform feasibility studies to create a base design as a foundation for decisions in the feasibility study phase of a project. You will conduct HV switching and other quality case root cause analysis with solid electrical Knowledge. HV switchgear product enhancements, upgrades, and maintenance.     You will develop HV switchgear products and solutions with high reliability and cost efficiency. You will conduct a design review, including DFMEA/DFM/DFA. You will perform prototyping & testing of GIS modules.     You will prepare design documentation (Development report, analysis report, assembly & test instruction, test specification, etc.). You will prepare technical documentation for the product. Excellent hands-on experience in drawing, BOM, GD&T, tolerance stack-up analysis. Manufacturing knowledge (casting, machining, forging, welding, bending, injection molding etc.) Knowledge of product change management process. Ability to work in a global environment Innovative & creative thinking ability.         Living Hitachi Energy s core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business               Your background         B.Tech./M.Tech. (Mechanical or Electrical) Design & development of high voltage switchgear (5 to 10 years).     Basic knowledge of switchgear product.     Hands-on experience in mechanism design & simulation. Knowledge and understanding of high-voltage products are desirable. knowledge and understanding of various IEC / IEEE / ANSI / IS / ISO / DIN / IP / NEMA standards.     Hands-on experience in FEA tools - Ansys, Creo Simulate, Creo Mechanism.     Working knowledge of design process/quality tools like DFMEA, DFM, DFA, DMAIC, DOE, etc. Solid hands-on experience with 3D model/PLM tools like Creo 4.0, Windchill, and SAP.         Proficiency in both spoken & written English language is required

Skill requirements:                   1. Proficient in programming (preferably in C/C++)               2. Knowledgeable about data structures and algorithms               3. Good understanding of digital logic                4. Knowledge and understanding of digital circuits and devices.                   Other requirements:                       Excellent problem-solving skills.                 Good verbal communication in English                 Good English writing skills

column2: The ideal candidate should hold a Bachelors or Masters degree in Electrical & Electronic Engineering. Additional VLSI design courses area plus.      The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of relevant working experience in semicustom design flow and project.      The ideal candidate should possess strong experience in implementation areas, including Synthesis, DFT, and PnR, as well as good exposure to signoff areas, particularly power, timing, and IR signoff.      Knowledge of physical verification (DRC & LVS) is considered an advantage      It is required that the candidate has exposure to basic version management using any of Clearcase\ / Perforce\ / Cliosoft\ / Git.      The candidate must possess excellent communication skills to interact effectively with peers and customers in a clear and honest manner      The candidate should be open to learning new technical areas if the need arises.      The ideal candidate should possess an internal drive to work with design and EDA vendors to solve issues and adopt new flows.      The candidate should have reasonable ability to automate design work by means of script programming, e.g. Tcl\/tk, Perl or Python         Responsibilities :       As a member of the Design Application Engineering (DAE) team at Infineon Bangalore, you will be responsible for supporting project teams using Infineon Design System (Flows, Design Packages, and Methodologies).      You will be the first point of contact for project teams in case of issues and will work to achieve the highest customer satisfaction.      You should have a deep understanding of and be able to support design methodologies across semi-custom design flows, including RTL analysis, design verification, DFT, synthesis, place and route, STA, EM\/IR, and physical verification.      You should be able to identify methodology gaps and improvements and provide automation to perform all design activities in the most efficient and correct-by-construction way.      You should be able to evaluate solutions from multiple available options and be able to perform trade-offs between technical features and cost.      You will work with R&D in Infineon globally and EDA tool vendors to resolve issues across semi-custom design flows.      You will coordinate with IT and EDA tool license teams to provide an infrastructure aligned with project needs.      Your primary goal is to significantly improve the quality, efficiency, and time to market of Infineon development projects

We are a global technology leader in robotic-assisted vascular interventions, surgical C-arms, and Cath labs. Our solutions have a wide impact across clinical domains (orthopedics, urology, neurosurgery, cardiac interventions and so on) across market segments.             Description/Definition             The System Engineer is responsible for specification and functional requirements and the verification of development results related to these requirements. He/she ensures continuous system-oriented development, ensures reliable clarification on system-relevant aspects and supports release activities as a system expert.              Key Areas of responsibility include but are not limited to:                       Requirements analysis and development of the system functional specification (PH).          Establish traceability between system functional specifications and its source requirements.          Develop system architecture in collaboration with the SW architecture team.          Plan and conduct system architecture reviews at defined project milestones to ensure coherence.          Support the realization process to ensure proper requirements implementation. This includes but is not limited to requirements clarification, design reviews, etc          Support the requirements development at Clinical Workflow for technical feasibility and review the requirement specification.          Plan and coordinate system integration with Project Management and Technology. Evaluate test results and provide recommendations for project decisions.          Lead the Change Control Board (CCB) and coordinate change requests and defect reports.          Define and establish quality gates in collaboration with Clinical Workflow and Technology.          Plan intermediate releases and product functionality for trade shows and clinical use tests in collaboration with Clinical Workflow and Technology.          Prepare supply chain creating design transfer documentation and database entries (eg SAP) as needed.          Analyze project ideas and proposals for feasibility and impact on existing commitments.          Support patent applications by evaluating content for feasibility and business impact.      The System Engineer of AT is actively and collaboratively involved in the continuous improvement of processes in his/her area of responsibility. column1: System Studies Engineer - HVDC Control & Protection
column2: Performing advanced network studies for HVDC projects during offers and execution (such studies include Dynamic Performance, Network Restoration, and Interaction).         Developing and validating detailed simulation models for several EMT software, such as PSCAD/EMTDC, Matlab/Simulink and EMTP-RV.         Optimizing the overall behavior of HVDC control systems (for instance with regards to dynamic and black-start performances) according to the customer s technical specifications and national grid code requirements.         Developing and parametrizing advanced HVDC control systems such active filtering, grid forming and multi-terminal controls.         Analyzing potential interactions, such as control and sub-synchronous torsional interactions, between the HVDC converter and other controlled devices in the power system via simulation models and the analysis of the converter harmonic impedance.         Presenting study results to customers written and orally, as well as training the customers on the developed simulation models and explaining their documentation.         Support to the project management with expertise in technical discussions, participation in customer meetings and coordination of external partners.               Your Skills And Qualifications               University degree (Master/Bachelor) in electrical power engineering.        5   + years of professional experience in the area of Power Systems studies and modelling of electrical network/HVDC/FACTS.         Good knowledge in high voltage applications, power transmission systems, power electronics and HVDC technology. Knowledge of relevant global standards, regulations, and guidelines.         Expertise in control engineering and modelling of HVDC systems in the time domain and frequency domain.         Professional user of typical power system simulation programs (eg, PSCAD/EMTDC, Matlab/Simulink, EMTP-RV, PSSE, Python Tools)         Fluent English mandatory (spoken and written).         Outstanding team skills, initiative, and customer orientation.         High ability to work in a multi-national and multi-cultural team.     This role is based in Gurgaon/Chennai, where you ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries - and the shape of things to come.               Find out more about Siemens careers at:      www.siemens.com/careers

column2: The RTL (Register Transfer Level) Design Engineer is responsible for designing and implementing digital circuits and systems using hardware description languages (HDL) and design tools     They work closely with cross-functional teams, including architects and verification engineers, to ensure that the design meets functional and performance requirements     The RTL Design Engineer plays a crucial role in the development of complex integrated circuits (ICs) and contributes to the overall success of the design projects       Key Responsibilities:       Design and implement digital circuits and systems at the RTL level using hardware description languages (HDL) such as VHDL or Verilog     Collaborate with system architects to understand design requirements and specifications     Develop microarchitecture and RTL coding for various functional blocks and modules     Utilize industry-standard design tools and methodologies for RTL design, synthesis, and optimization     Perform logic design, register transfer level coding, and functional verification of digital designs     Conduct timing analysis and optimization to ensure design performance meets specifications     Collaborate with physical design engineers to address design constraints and ensure successful physical implementation     Participate in design reviews and contribute to the identification and resolution of design issues     Write and maintain design documentation, including specifications, design constraints, and test plans     Keep up to date with the latest developments in RTL design methodologies, tools, and technologies       Qualifications and Skills:       Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field     X years of experience in digital IC design or RTL design, preferably in the semiconductor industry     Proficiency in hardware description languages (HDL) such as VHDL or Verilog     Strong understanding of digital design principles, RTL coding techniques, and synchronous design methodologies     Experience with industry-standard EDA (Electronic Design Automation) tools, such as synthesis, simulation, and verification tools     Familiarity with scripting languages (eg, Tcl, Perl, Python) for design automation and scripting tasks     Knowledge of digital design verification methodologies, including simulation, linting, and formal verification     Familiarity with FPGA prototyping and emulation platforms is a plus     Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, with attention to detail     Strong communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams

column2: We are looking for a Senior Engineer with expertise in developing  security systems  based on  embedded Linux operating systems . The successful candidate will lead the product development efforts, collaborating with external teams to ensure the delivery of robust and scalable security solutions. This role requires a strong technical background in embedded systems, Linux kernel development, and security protocols. Role & responsibilities  :   Lead the end-to-end development of security systems based on embedded Linux OS, including requirement analysis, architecture design, implementation, and testing. Work closely with external development teams to define project milestones, allocate resources, and monitor progress to ensure timely delivery. Design and implement security features such as secure boot, encryption, access control, and intrusion detection on embedded Linux platforms. Optimize system performance and resource utilization through kernel tuning, driver development, and system-level optimizations. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate security solutions into the overall product ecosystem, ensuring compatibility and interoperability. Conduct thorough code reviews, perform security assessments, and implement best practices to mitigate security vulnerabilities. Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends related to embedded Linux and cybersecurity, and incorporate relevant advancements into the product roadmap. Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation. Preferred candidate profile   Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field. Extensive experience [ Min. 10 Yrs. ]  in embedded software development, with focus on Linux-based systems. Proficiency in C/C++ programming and strong knowledge of Linux kernel internals, device drivers, and system-level programming. Solid understanding of security principles and protocols, including encryption algorithms, authentication mechanisms, and secure communication protocols. Hands-on experience with hardware platforms commonly used in embedded systems, such as ARM-based processors and microcontrollers. Previous experience managing outsourcing relationships and coordinating with external development teams is highly desirable. Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts effectively. Certifications such as Certified Embedded Systems Engineer (CESE) or Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) are a plus.
column11: Product Development, Kernel Development, Embedded Linux, ARM Processor, Project Management, C Programming Language, Code Review, Encryption, Product Engineering, Security Systems
